SEARCH
Package com.nebulous.chat.client

Class UserInputHandler

java.lang.Object
com.nebulous.chat.client.UserInputHandler
public class UserInputHandler extends Object
The UserInputHandler class is responsible for interacting with the user to gather necessary input such as the user's name and the server's address. This class provides methods to prompt the user for input, and if no input is provided, it uses default values.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserInputHandler

      public UserInputHandler()

  • Method Details

    • getUserName

      public static String getUserName(Scanner scanner)
      Prompts the user to enter their desired username. If the user does not provide a username (i.e., they press ENTER without typing), the default username is used. The default username is defined in ChatConstants.DEFAULT_USER_NAME.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object used to read user input from the console.
      Returns:
      The username entered by the user or the default username if no input is provided.

    • getServerAddress

      public static String getServerAddress(Scanner scanner)
      Prompts the user to enter the server IP address to which the client should connect. If the user does not provide an address (i.e., they press ENTER without typing), the default address "localhost" is used.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object used to read user input from the console.
      Returns:
      The server address entered by the user or "localhost" if no input is provided.
